info.title: TuitionEventic API
info.description:
Upon successfully providing bill information, the corresponding materials will be reviewed by LianLian Pay. 

It’s allowed to re-provide the materials with respect to the bill being rejected. 

Please firstly use Document Api to upload materials. Note: if the document name is replicated, the previous old document will be replaced by the new one.

400.description:
Bad Request

Possible error codes:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 020102|Payer is auditing|
| 020103|Payer is rejected|
| 020301|trading material already exist |
| 020302|trading meterial document amount exceed limit|
| 020401|bill not exist or invalid |
| 020303|bill amount does not match with tuition amount|
| 020501|payer does not exist|
| 999995 |Parameter is error. |

attachment.description:
Document id, supported file extensions are PDF, JPG, GIF. 5 documents at most.
Sample：2018072227039320,2018072227039320

post.description:
Submit trading material documents. Before making a request, supporting documents should be uploaded into Lianlian Pay's file system first. Supporting document reviewing results will be returned via webhook 

The following verifications will be conducted on trading materials: 
1. to verify whether the bill exists;
2. to verify whether the “documentId” is valid; and 
3. to reject uploading the new materials if there is verification under progress or the same is completed before.
